thread.title: Here are all the games announced for Switch 2
thread.title_full: Here are all the games announced for Switch 2

author: Steve Wright
title: Here are all the games announced for Switch 2
text:
And there's a lot!
Throughout last night’s Nintendo Direct, a barrage of titles coming to the new Switch 2 were thrown at viewers. This post will gather them all up for you in one handy place.
Switch 2 games coming at launch
- Mario Kart World
- Street Fighter 6
- Split Fiction
- Hogwarts Legacy
- Hitman World of Assassination
- Bravely Default Flying Fairy HD Remaster
- Yakuza 0 Director’s Cut
- Deltarune Chapters 1-4
- Cyberpunk 2077 Ultimate Edition
- Civilization 7
- Survival Kids
- Kunitsu-Gami Path of the Goddess
- Puyo Puyo Tetris 2S
- Rune Factory Guardians of Azuma
- Nobunaga’s Ambition Awakening Complete Edition
- Fast Fusion
- Fortnite
- Arcade Archives 2 Ridge Racer
Switch 2 games coming after launch
- Kirby Air Riders
- Donkey Kong Bananza
- Drag x Drive
- Hyrule Warriors Age of Imprisonment
- Remastered Mystery of the Soulless Army
- Tamagotchi Plaza
- Shadow Labyrinth
- Wild Hearts S
- No Sleep For Kaname Date – From AI The Somnium Files
- Story of Seasons Grand Bazaar
- Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4
- Demon X Machina Titanic Scion
- Borderlands 4
- Hollow Knight Silksong
- Goodnight Universe
- Two Point Museum
- Witchbrook
- Marvel Cosmic Invasion
- Star Wars Outlaws
- Elden Ring Tarnished Edition
- Reanimal
- Professor Layton and The New World of Steam
- Starseeker Astroneer Expeditions
- The Duskbloods
- Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade
- WWE 2K
- NBA 2K
- Enter the Gungeon 2
- Human Fall Flat 2
- Hades 2
- Madden NFL
- EA Sports FC
- Project 007
There are also a number of Switch titles that will be enhanced on the Switch 2, including The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild, The Legend of Zelda Tears of the Kingdom, Pokemon Legends Z-A, and more.
GameCube games including The Legend of Zelda Wind Waker will also be added to Switch 2 via Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack.
What do you think of the Switch 2‘s selection of games?
This article may contain affiliate links, meaning we could earn a small commission if you click-through and make a purchase. Stevivor is an independent outlet and our journalism is in no way influenced by any advertiser or commercial initiative.
